p: The Wistar rats were selected randomly and allotted into 4 groups of 10 rats in each one: Group I consists of normal control rats (C), Group II control rats were given intraperitoneally T. leucocladum extract (C + TL), Group III consists of STZ-induced diabetic rats (D), and Group IV diabetic rats were given intraperitoneally T. leucocladum extract 100 mg/kg (D + TL).
